channel.title: Your Own WebClient, too simple!
channel.description:
My web client couldn't be simpler... just enter your server name, ip and port and my client will load your server, then just add it to your website.
If your thinking this is a virus, I don't understand how a bunch of html and jars is a virus, other than html auto down loaders.
Go into play.php.htm and search for yourport. The server name and ip address goes near the port, just look for it. You want pictures? Pics would be boring, only because my port and ip are blank so it wouldn't load anything.
Feel free to removed the ads, and removing the "Made by benny679 of moparscape" will destroy the client. How? When the webpage loads it checks if the label is still there. If a lecher deleted it the html deletes itself.
Download!!!! : [url=http://www.bbhhacks.webs.com/yourclient.rar]www.bbhhacks.webs.com/yourclient.rar[/url]
Update: If you don't have your own website my server is free for hosting a server or client. And yes, it's free!!! Just pm. And if I hosted your client/server it would be on a home server not a cruddy free website hoster.
Update 2: Tut coming soon
